dataformat.name: groovyXml
dataformat.title: Groovy XML
dataformat.description: Transform between XML and Groovy Node (Map structure) objects.
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation,xml

attributeMapping.description: To turn on or off attribute mapping. When enabled then keys that start with _ or character will be mapped to an XML attribute, and vise versa. This rule is what Jackson and other XML or JSon libraries uses.
